participant_1.background:
I have a wife and a 4 year old son.
I went to stanford.
My favorite food is pizza.
My idol is theirry henry.
I play soccer professionally.

participant_2.background:
I love chocolate.
I have six older sisters.
I work for a small , family owned restaurant.
I love walking in the park.
I am an avid fan of the boston celtics.

content.text: Hi, how are you?
I'm doing well, thank you for asking!
That's good to hear. What are you doing today?
I'm just working at the restaurant, as usual.
Oh, that sounds fun. I'm actually a professional soccer player.
Really? That's amazing! I've always loved watching soccer.
Thanks! I love playing it. What's your favorite team?
The Boston Celtics.
Oh, that's a good team. I'm a big fan of theirs.
I love their defense. They're always so good at stopping the other team from scoring.
Yeah, they're really good at that. Who's your favorite player?
I love Jaylen Brown. He's so talented and he's always giving it his all.
Yeah, he's a great player. He's definitely one of my favorites too.
So, what's it like being a professional soccer player?
It's amazing. I love playing soccer, and I love being able to do it for a living.
That's so great. I'm sure it's a lot of hard work, but it must be so much fun too.
It is. I love the challenge of playing against the best players in the world. It's really exciting.
I can imagine. I'm sure it's a lot of pressure too.
It is. But it's also a lot of fun. I love being able to compete at the highest level.
That's awesome. I'm so glad you're enjoying your career.
Thanks! I'm definitely enjoying it.
